title: What are some good automotive project topics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends what the project is for. I would normally say build your own car! Fun and very enriching experience. Plus it teaches you many curse words you never thought existed! For research topics I have a friend who is studying sound engineering. He did his research project on how vehicles enhance or cancel engine noise through the sound system. This is prevalent in the Toyota Prius and BMW i8.
